channel.title: Fiji on Arjen's travels
channel.description: Recent content in Fiji on Arjen's travels

item.title: Pacific islands, here I come!
item.description: Viti Levu This Saturday, June 30, I’ll take a plane to the Cook Islands, where I’ll spent almost two weeks enjoying the sun, after which I’ll take a flight out to Fiji. Everything I’ve read about these lovely places indicates that it will be very expensive to make phone calls or use the internet on the islands there, so I have no intention of doing either.
